title: runtui: Deduplicate list rendering (5+ appendXList methods share ~80% logic)
description: The appendAgentsList, appendIssuesList, appendDocsList, appendPlanList, appendLogsList methods share ~80% of their logic (prefixing, truncation, selection styling, meta-line rendering). Create a generic list-rendering utility. Similarly, issueDetailLines, docDetailLines, planDetailLines, logDetailLines all manually handle empty states and title rendering. Relates to phase p2-runtui-refactor.
